scripts.build: rollup -c && npx -p typescript tsc dist/dev.copper.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly --outFile dist/copper.d.ts
scripts.example: npm run build & sirv tests --port 5000 --dev true
scripts.dev: npm run build & sirv --port 5000 --dev true --single tests/interactive.html
scripts.publish.no-increment: npm run build && npm run test && npm publish
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run test && increment-patch && npm publish
